comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when delete data source, data set and dynamic parameter at one time.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070207-0941

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a data source, a data set, and a dynamic parameter binding to the data 
   set in a library.
2. New a report, extend the data source, data set and the parameter from the 
   library.
3. In Outline View, select the data source, data set, and the parameter, click 
   Delete.

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out and the data source, data set and parameter are deleted.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
